apps.name: 360_Video_Viewer
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Renders 360-degree video onto an inverted sphere mesh, allowing users to stand on a central platform and view immersive panoramic footage. Creates a video node mapped to the sphere's geometry with 2:1 aspect ratio and plays it in a looping mode. Supports uploaded files and m3u8 streams.

apps.name: 360Player_Mono
apps.author: MetaRick
apps.description: Renders a 360-degree mono video onto a sphere mesh, playing it as a looping skybox. Accepts an uploaded video file or a pasted URL link via configurable props, and maps the video texture with 16:9 aspect ratio to the sphere geometry on the client side.

apps.name: Alien_Planet
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Scene app that renders an alien planet environment by configuring a sky node with a custom texture, HDR lighting, sun direction/intensity calculated from elevation and azimuth angles, and cyan-tinted fog with adjustable near/far distances.

apps.name: AlleySign
apps.author: MetaRick
apps.description: Loads an alley sign GLB model and rotates it continuously around its Y-axis at a configurable speed using the per-frame update loop. A simple demonstration of scripted object rotation without triggering GLB animations.

apps.name: Amanita
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Clones a mushroom 3D model up to 500 times and scatters them randomly across a configurable rectangular area with randomized rotation and scale. Spawns an Amanita particle-like field useful for ground cover like grass or fungi.

apps.name: anybox
apps.author: ash
apps.description: A reusable container box that plays a configurable looping background audio track at low volume and renders a floating UI label reading 'Background Audio' above the 3D model. Designed as an organizational shell for logic-based apps.

apps.name: ArrayVectorProps
apps.author: ~/MayD524/Hyperfy
apps.description: Demonstrates custom array and vector3 prop types by configuring arrayFile, arrayNumber, arrayRange, and vector3 props via app.configure(), then logs each prop value on the client. Requires the Bitmato ArrayProps mod to render extended property editors for emote files and numeric ranges.

apps.name: BasicMp3Player
apps.author: Valiant
apps.description: Minimal clickable MP3 player that plays and pauses an audio node when the user clicks a GLB cube mesh. Supports uploaded files or pasted URLs, with configurable volume, loop, spatial/global mode, and auto-play on upload.

apps.name: Bats_v1
apps.author: Valiant
apps.description: Spawns a configurable swarm of up to 5000 bat clones that animates wing-flapping and erratic flight paths each frame. Plays a looping spatial audio clip for the swarm ambience. Exposes UI controls for bat count, scale, wingbeat speed, fly speed, and sound toggle.

apps.name: bending_leaf_V1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Loads a skinned-mesh leaf 3D model and plays a looping 'bend' animation on its rig. Demonstrates skeletal animation on a simple organic object, though skinned meshes lack click interaction without an invisible collider box.

apps.name: BlockTesting
apps.author: Shiffty
apps.description: Captures right mouse button input to apply a blocking emote effect on the local player with snare and long duration, then clears the effect on release. Uses applyEffect to trigger a Great Sword Blocking Idle animation. Created as a bug report testing effect cancellation behavior.

apps.name: Book_-_Flip
apps.author: Dhin
apps.description: Spawns a procedural book object from box primitives with static physics colliders. Pressing F triggers a flip emote and pushes the player upward and forward using camera-relative impulse vectors, functioning as a double-jump launchpad.

apps.name: Boombox
apps.author: Dhin
apps.description: Renders a detailed old-school boombox built from primitive shapes (speakers, cassette deck, knobs, antenna) and plays looping spatial audio with configurable volume, distance, and rolloff. Syncs play/pause state between server and clients via networked events, toggled by a clickable action button wi

apps.name: broke-rom
apps.author: general hyper
apps.description: Renders a configurable 3D ROM cartridge model and shifts its mesh texture UV coordinates based on a color dropdown selection, unlinking the mesh and material to apply per-instance tinting across seven color options including red, green, blue, and violet.

apps.name: Builder_Drone
apps.author: devbyte
apps.description: Spawns a flyable builder drone with spinning rotors that a player controls via a configurable hold-key keybind. Syncs position and quaternion across server and clients using networked events, and overrides the camera to a first-person drone view for building in flight mode.

apps.name: Builder_Drone_X501
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Flyable builder drone that captures keyboard and mouse input to let a player pilot a 3D drone model in first-person camera mode. Animates spinning rotors, syncs position and quaternion across clients via networked state, and releases control on disconnect or keypress.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns a swarm of 50 butterfly clones with randomized scale, position, and flap speed. Animates wing rotation and vertical floating movement each frame using sinusoidal math on the update loop, creating a gentle ambient butterfly swarm from a single GLB model.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V2a
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns a swarm of 100 butterfly clones from a GLB model, animates wing flapping via sinusoidal rotation, and drifts each butterfly along randomized 3D paths with per-instance scale, speed, and position offsets updated every frame.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V3
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones from a GLB wing model and animates their wing-flapping and oscillatory flight paths each frame. A configurable UI panel exposes butterfly amount, random scale range, flap-speed range, and fly-speed range for tuning swarm behavior.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V4
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns a configurable swarm of up to 5000 butterfly clones from a GLB model, animates wing flapping and oscillatory flight paths using sine-wave motion on each frame update. A UI panel exposes controls for butterfly count, scale range, flap speed, and fly speed.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V5
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones from a GLB wing model and animates their wing flapping, sinusoidal flight paths, and drift movement each frame. Configurable UI controls adjust butterfly count, random scale range, flap speed, and fly speed. Clamps Y position so butterflies never fly below ground.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V6
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones from a GLB wing model and animates their wing-flapping and drifting flight paths each frame. A configurable UI panel controls spawn area, height, amount, scale range, flap-speed, and fly-speed for the swarm.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V6_Hyperfly_edition
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones with emissive cyan wing materials across a configurable 3D area. Animates wing flapping and sinusoidal drift movement per-frame on the client. Configurable scale, flap speed, fly speed, spawn height, and area size via UI panel.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V6_Hyperfly_edition2
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 butterfly clones with randomized scale, flap speed, and flight paths across a configurable 3D area. Animates wing flapping and drifting movement each frame using cloned GLB wing nodes with emissive cyan materials inside group containers.

apps.name: Butterfly_Swarm_V6_Hyperfly_edition2_BW
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 black-and-white butterfly clones with randomized scale, flap speed, and fly speed. Animates wing rotation each frame using sinusoidal flapping and drifting within a configurable 3D spawn area. Clones GLB wing nodes into group containers with emissive materials.

apps.name: cam_raycast_action_bar
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Renders a 10-slot action bar UI at the bottom of the screen with keybind labels and WoW-style spell icons. Triggers a camera-based raycast on key press (Q) that sends the ray direction and origin to the server via networked events for server-side hit detection.

apps.name: Camera_Trigger
apps.author: Dhin
apps.description: Creates a trigger zone collider that detects when the local player steps on it and smoothly lerps the camera to a fixed overlook position. On exit, the camera transitions back to the player's eye level. Ideal for museum or gallery camera control.

apps.name: CameraLaser
apps.author: Shiffty
apps.description: Equippable laser gun that shoots red laser beams from the camera direction. Players trigger an action to equip, then fire lasers on mouse click. Laser clones spawn via networked events, fade out over 3 seconds, and are cleaned up by the server.

apps.name: CameraManager
apps.author: Shiffty
apps.description: Reusable camera management system that switches between follow, orbit, and static modes, triggers smooth transitions between camera states, and applies configurable screen shake effects. Listens for world events like camera:follow and camera:shake to control camera position and rotation with damping

apps.name: CameraManagerTest
apps.author: Shiffty
apps.description: Test rig that spawns animated cubes moving in circle, bounce, and figure-8 patterns, then cycles through follow, orbit, static, and default camera modes via keyboard input. Emits camera:follow, camera:orbit, camera:shake, and camera:reset events and renders a screen-space UI panel showing the active

apps.name: car1
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Client-side drivable car that simulates raycast suspension, steering, and acceleration forces per wheel during fixedUpdate. Players anchor into the vehicle body and control it with WASD keys, while tire hubs animate rotation and lateral grip using physics raycasts against the ground.

apps.name: car1-v2
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Drivable car with raycast suspension that simulates spring forces, lateral grip, and anti-roll stabilization per wheel. Players steer and accelerate via WASD controls, and an anchor node seats the driver. Uses fixedUpdate physics with world.raycast to ground each tire and apply forces at local posit

apps.name: Companion_v8
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: AI-powered VRM companion NPC named Victor that follows players, patrols within a configurable radius, scans nearby objects, and responds to chat commands via HuggingFace API with a cowboy Securitron personality. Animates idle and walk cycles on the avatar using emote assets.

apps.name: CONFETTT_PPOT
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Networked confetti popper that spawns randomized particle bursts from up to 8 customizable confetti textures when clicked. Plays spatial click and explosion audio, syncs cooldown state across clients, and animates emissive glow on hover.

apps.name: Cube_1
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Scrolls a cube mesh's texture along the X axis each frame using a configurable speed prop. Sets the mesh to unlinked mode so each unique app instance animates its textureX offset independently, enabling per-instance UV scroll control.

apps.name: Curved_Video_Viewer
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Renders video onto a curved 3D mesh by replacing a named target object with a video node. Supports mp4 files and HLS (m3u8) streams, with configurable aspect ratio, fit mode (cover/contain/none), and loop toggle. Plays the video automatically on the client side.

apps.name: CurvedVid_with_link_input
apps.author: MetaRick
apps.description: Renders a video stream onto a curved 3D screen mesh, supporting both uploaded video files and pasted URL links. Creates a video node that copies the mesh position and quaternion, then plays the video in a looped 16:9 aspect ratio with cover mode enabled.

apps.name: dash
apps.author: peezy
apps.description: Spammable dash ability that pushes the player forward in the camera direction when pressing F, triggers a charge emote animation for 0.4 seconds, and renders a configurable color-tinted 3D rom model with a UI label displaying the rom name.

apps.name: DAY_NIGHT_WEATHER_CURRENT
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Solar panel controller that rotates the sun and sky through a real-time day/night cycle, spawns weather particle systems (rain, dust storms, lightning, fog, nuclear ash), and plays thunder and rain audio. Renders a Pip-Boy-style UI displaying current time and days passed.

apps.name: Discord3
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Broadcasts world events to a Discord webhook: sends player join/leave and chat messages, tracks session duration, and renders a rotating Discord logo with screen-space UI notifications. Supports excluding specific player names and toggling logo visibility.

apps.name: Eagles_v1
apps.author: Valiant
apps.description: Spawns up to 6 soaring eagle clones from a GLB model and animates their wing flaps, circular flight paths, and thermal drift on each frame update. Plays spatial eagle call audio on random flap events. Exposes a configurable UI panel for eagle count, scale, wingbeat speed, soar speed, height range, a

apps.name: eel_add_particles1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns additive glow-dust particles that track a skeleton bone position each frame using getBoneTransform. Plays a 'flow' animation on the rig and allows configuring a custom particle texture via app properties.

apps.name: eel_add_particles1_1
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns additive glow-dust particles attached to a specific bone of an animated rig. Reads bone transform each frame via getBoneTransform and positions the particle emitter in world space, with a configurable particle texture and alpha-over-life fade curve.

apps.name: Emote_Rom
apps.author: HowieDuhzit
apps.description: Binds up to 10 emote animations to number keys (0-9), triggers player emote effects with a floating emoji UI indicator above the avatar, and syncs playback across all clients via server broadcast so every player sees the animation and emoji in multiplayer.

apps.name: Emote_Rom_1
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Emote player ROM that triggers up to 10 configurable emote animations via numpad keys, syncs playback across multiplayer clients using server broadcast, and renders a floating emoji UI billboard above each player during the emote duration.

apps.name: EmotesR
apps.author: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
apps.description: Emote wheel that renders a radial UI menu on screen, triggered by pressing B. Players select from six dance emote animations (ThaRoof, Snake, Belly, Headbob, Hip Hop, Gangnam) arranged in a circle, which applies the chosen emote to the avatar via applyEffect.

apps.name: Explosion_Sprites
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a hemisphere-shaped particle emitter that renders explosion sprites from a configurable spritesheet texture. Uses a 2x4 grid spritesheet with up to 10,000 particles in world space, serving as a reference demo for the Hyperfy particles API.

apps.name: Fire
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a cone-shaped fire particle emitter using additive blending, with color transitioning from red to orange to black over lifetime. Renders particles with configurable texture image, size scaling, and rotation curves for a realistic flame effect.

apps.name: firstHYP
apps.author: vox
apps.description: Loads a GLB room model named ROOMERS4 and scrolls UV texture offsets on a mesh named UVSCROLL each frame, animating the material along the Y-axis at a configurable speed for a seamless looping effect on gold element plane textures.

apps.name: firstHYPv2
apps.author: vox
apps.description: Renders a room environment (ROOMERS4) with a GLB model and scrolls UV texture offsets on a mesh named UVSCROLL each frame, animating the Y-axis at 0.5 speed using material textureX/textureY properties for seamless looping.

apps.name: Fog
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a box-shaped particle emitter that renders slow-drifting, semi-transparent fog across a 20x20 area. Uses a configurable texture image and alphaOverLife curve to fade particles in and out, creating an atmospheric fog layer in the environment.

apps.name: Forest
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Procedural forest generator that clones up to 10,000 tree models across configurable circle or rectangle distribution shapes. Spawns clustered and scattered trees with randomized scale and rotation using a UI panel for clone count, cluster density, inner radius, and area size.

apps.name: Framed_Image_v1.0
apps.author: Valiant
apps.description: Renders a customizable framed image using box primitives for the frame, with configurable rim thickness, depth, color, emissive glow, backboard, and a disco mode that animates hue-cycling on frame or backboard. Spawns box colliders in multiple modes and supports transparent image panels with shadow

apps.name: Free_Camera
apps.author: vox
apps.description: Toggles a freecam or orbit camera mode via configurable hotkeys, letting users fly freely or orbit around a target position. Renders an in-world UI panel with stepper controls to adjust move speed, look speed, lerp, radius, and height in real time.

apps.name: FTV
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: In-world TV media player that plays up to five configurable video channels on a 3D model screen mesh. Triggers a channel-change sound effect when switching videos, supports autoplay, shuffle, spatial audio falloff, and renders mini UI controls for playback.

apps.name: Game_Timer
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Renders a configurable countdown timer as an on-screen UI panel that ticks down each second from a user-defined minute value. Displays MM:SS formatted text and stops at 00:00. Colors, alpha, and duration are customizable via app.configure fields.

apps.name: generate_monstera_V1
apps.author: Agent12
apps.description: Procedural plant generator that clones a monstera leaf GLB model 3-30 times, stacking clones vertically with randomized spacing, rotation, and linearly interpolated scale so each instance renders a unique monstera plant arrangement in the scene.

apps.name: Gert-2-1-aloe
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Spawns configurable Aloe Vera plant clones across a rectangular area, randomizing position, Y-axis rotation, and uniform scale for each 3D model instance. Users configure clone count, area width/depth, and min/max size through a UI panel.

apps.name: Glow_Dust
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a glowing additive particle system inside a box-shaped volume, emitting 200 small dust particles per second with configurable texture image. Uses alphaOverLife curves to fade particles in and out, creating an ambient glow dust effect.

apps.name: Grass_V1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 10,000 grass clones across a configurable area, distributing them in randomized clusters with adjustable density and radius. Clones wind-animated 3D grass models with random rotation and scale to simulate a natural breeze across the terrain.

apps.name: Grass_V3
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 10,000 grass and flower clones across a configurable area, distributing them in randomized clusters with adjustable density, size, and radius. Clones six wind-animated 3D grass/flower models with random rotation and scale for natural-looking ground cover.

apps.name: Grid_Floor_v2
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Renders a world-scale grid floor using a Kenney prototype texture on a GLB model and positions it slightly above the origin at y=0.03. Serves as a simple environment base tile for scene building.

apps.name: GroupieV1
apps.author: b34k3r
apps.description: Collectron NPC that patrols a configurable radius, detects nearby items, and follows players via chat commands. Animates idle, walk, and search states on a VRM avatar. Renders Pip-Boy-style UI bars tracking health and loot depletion over time, and responds to chat with status reports.

apps.name: Healing_Aura
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns two green particle emitters in a circular aura pattern: small rising dots with orbital velocity and larger additive-blended lines that fade over their lifetime. Configurable textures allow customizing particle images. Serves as a reference demo for the Hyperfy particles API.

apps.name: Health
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Spawns a collectible health pack GLB model that animates with continuous Y-axis rotation. Responds to proximity-check and ping events, triggers item-detected and item-cleanup emissions when a collectron collects it within range, then hides the mesh.

apps.name: HELIv4
apps.author: vox
apps.description: Helicopter that flies an oval path with curvature-based speed adjustment, scrolls UV textures on a rotor mesh to simulate spinning blades, and plays a looping spatial idle engine audio that tracks the helicopter position. Interpolates yaw and pitch for smooth banking turns.

apps.name: hexagonal_test_basic
apps.author: cru
apps.description: Hexagonal floor panels that react to player contact by oscillating vertically and scrolling UV offsets to cycle colors. Each panel shifts downward when stepped on and smoothly returns to an idle sine-wave oscillation when released, with configurable amplitude, frequency, and scroll speed.

apps.name: hexagonal_test_networked
apps.author: cru
apps.description: Networked hexagonal floor panels that detect player contact and react by shifting downward and scrolling UV offsets to cycle colors. The server simulates oscillation, dip movement, and UV state transitions, then broadcasts panel state to all clients for synchronized visuals.

apps.name: hover-cursor-test
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a screen-space white circle UI cursor that toggles visibility when the user hovers over a Cube mesh, using onPointerEnter and onPointerLeave events to activate and deactivate the fake cursor overlay.

apps.name: HP-eliza-2-1-app_1
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Spawns an AI-driven NPC agent using a VRM avatar that listens for chat messages and player enter/leave events, sends them to an external Eliza endpoint, and renders speech bubble UI responses. The agent triggers configurable emotes and rotates to look at nearby players.

apps.name: HyperBeacon_v2
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Beacon app that registers a world with a Zesty spatial relay by sending a PUT request on load and transmits session heartbeat signals every 4.5 seconds via fetch. Animates a rotating 3D model (ring and hyper mesh) on each update frame to indicate active beacon status.

apps.name: HyperPortal_with_Set
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Portal trigger zone that teleports players to an admin-configurable destination. Admins click a 'Set' button in the inspect UI to store their current position on the server, and any player entering the portal collider is teleported to that saved location.

apps.name: HyperPortal_with_Set_Manual
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Portal that teleports players to a stored destination when they enter a trigger zone. Admins configure the target position via a UI switch: 'Set' captures the player's current location, while 'Manual' allows typing exact X/Y/Z coordinates. Position syncs from server to all clients.

apps.name: JUKEBOX_UI
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Multi-track jukebox that plays up to five configurable audio tracks with spatial 3D sound. Renders an in-world UI panel displaying track name, playback status, elapsed time, and animated visualizer bars. Supports shuffle, loop, next/prev navigation, and configurable volume and accent color.

apps.name: Jumping_Frog
apps.author: fractilians
apps.description: Builds a procedural frog character from primitive spheres, cylinders, and boxes, then animates a looping hop cycle with squash-and-stretch scaling, hind-leg joint rotation, a red tongue flick at jump apex, and subtle eye bobbing on each frame.

apps.name: Launchpad
apps.author: Dhin
apps.description: Trampoline-style launchpad that detects player entry via a trigger zone on a 3D model and pushes the player upward with a vertical force vector, acting as a bouncy jump pad for traversal.

apps.name: Locationator
apps.author: MetaRick
apps.description: Renders a billboarded UI text label above a placed 3D model that displays live world position (X, Y, Z) and rotation (RX, RY, RZ) coordinates, updating each frame to help builders identify exact teleport destinations.

apps.name: Loot
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Spawns a collectible loot pack GLB model that animates with continuous Y-axis rotation. Responds to proximity-check and ping events from a collectron, triggers item-detected and item-cleanup world events upon collection, then hides the 3D model. Part of a space trading sim prototype.

apps.name: Loot-PlanetLava
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Renders a rotating lava planet GLB model as a collectible cargo loot pack. Listens for proximity-check and ping events, then emits item-detected when a collectron entity moves within range, supporting a space trading sim loop.

apps.name: Loot-Ringed_Planet
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Renders a rotating ringed planet GLB model that acts as a collectible loot item in a space trading sim. Animates continuous Y-axis rotation on update, listens for proximity-check events to trigger collection by a collectron, and emits item-detected and pong events for cross-app communication.

apps.name: m2-2-4-beacon-dev
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Beacon app that registers world metadata (name, URL, description, image, tags) to the Zesty relay server and sends periodic session heartbeat signals via fetch on each update tick. Renders a small 3D model as a visual anchor in the scene.

apps.name: Machine_Gun_v8
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Pickupable machine gun that fires raycasts on mouse click, plays spatial gunfire audio, and renders a pulsing overheat UI bar. Features server-validated overheat/cooldown, scope zoom with eased transitions, and 19 directional movement emote animations for the holder.

apps.name: Machine_Gun_With_Animation
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Equippable machine gun weapon that overrides player locomotion animations with rifle-specific emotes for idle, walk, sprint, and directional movement. Players triggers a pick-up action, and the script syncs shooting and drop events across client and server via networked messages.

apps.name: Mato_Pet_v2
apps.author: ~/MayD524/Hyperfy
apps.description: Spawns a VRM pet companion that follows a target player using configurable follow speed and avoidance distance. Animates idle, walking, and sitting emotes via networked state sync. Uses a modular GameObject framework with lerped position/quaternion interpolation and ownership transfer across server

apps.name: Mato_Pets
apps.author: ~/MayD524/Hyperfy
apps.description: Networked VRM pet that follows a target player using raycasting for obstacle avoidance. Players can adopt the pet via an interaction action. Animates idle, walking, and sitting emotes, and syncs position/quaternion across clients with interpolation.

apps.name: MINI-Nuke
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Interactive mini-nuke weapon that detonates on player action, spawning radiation particle clouds with ☢ symbols, playing explosion and Geiger counter audio, and dealing periodic radiation damage to nearby players within a configurable blast radius.

apps.name: MINI-NukePORTAL
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Interactive mini-nuke that players detonate via an action trigger, spawning radiation particle clouds with ☢ symbols, playing explosion and Geiger counter audio, dealing AoE radiation damage to nearby players, and opening a portal to a configurable destination world URL after a timed delay.

apps.name: Mob_-_Skelly
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Skeleton mob NPC that spawns with a VRM avatar, chases players within an aggro radius, damages them with melee attacks, and respawns after death. Uses a threat table to track targets, animates idle/run/attack/dead emotes, and syncs state across server and clients via networked events in the Prism Pv

apps.name: Model
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Loads a GLB 3D model and traverses its mesh nodes to create a rigidbody with geometry-based colliders for each mesh. Exposes configurable scale and a collision toggle switch via the app UI, enabling quick physics-ready placement of custom models.

apps.name: monkey_head
apps.author: .hyp shaman
apps.description: Renders a monkey head 3D model with a jump button texture and configurable jumpHeight prop. The script is empty, serving as a minimal template to demonstrate app structure with a GLB model and texture asset loaded into the scene.

apps.name: MoonJump
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Tracks player grounded state via world.raycast and pushes an upward force vector to grant an automatic double jump when airborne. Resets jump state on landing and manages per-player state maps for multiplayer support.

apps.name: n1-n1-05
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Loads a GLB model and sets its collider to trimesh mode by disabling convex on the collider node, enabling precise collision detection that matches the exact mesh geometry rather than a simplified convex hull.

apps.name: NEON_1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders customizable neon sign text by cloning 3D letter meshes and positioning them with configurable spacing, scale, height, glow intensity, color, and alignment. Supports A-Z, 0-9, and special characters via a UI panel for real-time text input.

apps.name: NEON_2
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a customizable neon sign by cloning glowing letter meshes from a GLB model based on user-typed text. Supports configurable spacing, scale, height, color, glow intensity, and alignment. Plays looping spatial audio with adjustable volume, distance, and rolloff settings via a UI panel.

apps.name: Networked_Grabbable
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Networked grabbable object (e.g. a gun) that players pick up via an action trigger within 3m. Attaches the 3D model to the holder's right hand bone transform each frame and syncs ownership state across clients. Press X to drop the item where you stand.

apps.name: Notifications
apps.author: Lastraum - theforgecore.xyz
apps.description: Renders a screen-space UI notification panel that animates slide-in/slide-out. Listens for world events via a configurable message key and queues incoming messages with optional color, fontSize, and timer. The panel auto-scales the 3D model to zero so nothing shows in-world.

apps.name: NPC_10
apps.author: peezy
apps.description: VRM-based NPC that detects players within a configurable FOV and range, chases them using walk/run animations, and triggers melee attack combos with hit detection via rigidbody colliders. Plays raptor audio on attack and emits networked npc:attack events with calculated hit positions for combat dama

apps.name: NPC_9
apps.author: peezy
apps.description: VRM-based NPC that animates idle, walk, run, and sit emotes, detects players within a configurable FOV and range, chases them, and triggers randomized attack animations with cooldown-based hit detection. Plays spatial raptor audio and syncs combat events across server and clients via networked messa

apps.name: NPC_Prisoner
apps.author: b34k3r
apps.description: Spawns a prisoner NPC with a VRM avatar that autonomously walks, idles, and talks using emote animations. A physics controller moves the character with gravity, pseudo-random direction changes, and smooth quaternion slerp rotation to face the current heading.

apps.name: PAY_TO_ENTER_DOOR
apps.author: peezy
apps.description: Animated door that triggers open after a Solana SPL token payment. Supports sliding and swinging modes with configurable direction, distance, and swing angle. Renders a billboard UI panel showing the token price, checks wallet balance, and auto-closes the door after a timer expires.

apps.name: Physics_-_Contacts__Tags
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Demonstrates rigidbody contact detection using tagged objects. Assigns tags to Blue and Red physics bodies, listens for onContactStart and onContactEnd events, and renders billboard UI text labels above each body showing which tagged object it is currently touching.

apps.name: Physics_-_Raycast_Tags
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Demonstrates physics raycasting with tagged rigidbodies. Casts a ray from a laser node each frame using world.raycast, detects hits on a dynamic blue collider, and renders the hit tag as billboard UI text. Supports cross-app raycasting between multiple instances.

apps.name: Physics_-_Triggers__Tags
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Demonstrates rigidbody trigger zones and tags by configuring a static blue body with a trigger collider and a dynamic red body with a convex collider. Detects onTriggerEnter and onTriggerLeave events, then renders a billboard UI text label displaying the entering object's tag.

apps.name: PingScriptFORcompanion
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Responds to ping events from a companion or minimap system by calculating distance via Math.hypot and emitting pong events with the object's configurable display name, type, and position. Attach to any 3D model to make it scannable as a landmark.

apps.name: Platforms
apps.author: .hyp shaman
apps.description: Configurable platformer template that spawns selectable platform sizes (small to extra-large) and triggers a falling platform via an area trigger zone. When a player steps on the trigger, the platform switches to dynamic physics after a configurable delay, then resets to its original position on a t

apps.name: Player_Transforms
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a screenspace UI panel that reads the local player's position, body quaternion, and camera direction each frame, then displays live XYZ coordinates and Euler rotation angles as color-coded text elements toggled by a showUI prop.

apps.name: PlayerTag-UInew
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Renders a customizable overhead player tag UI with Fallout-themed color presets, animated text glow effects, configurable badge icons, and a keyboard toggle key. Creates billboard-anchored uitext nodes for name, level, and faction badges above the player.

apps.name: position
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Renders a screen-space UI panel at the center of the display that reads the local player's position each frame and updates a text element showing live X, Y, Z coordinates. Built as a debug tool to pinpoint locations in a world.

apps.name: Prism
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Class-based PvPvE combat system that damages players on hit events, triggers death emotes with freeze effects, teleports defeated players to configurable respawn locations, heals survivors over time, and renders floating damage numbers as billboard UI text on clients.

apps.name: PvE_Sword
apps.author: peezy
apps.description: PvE melee sword that players pick up and attach to their right hand via bone tracking. Left-click triggers randomized attack emotes and fires an overlapSphere hit check that damages nearby players with critical hit chance. Syncs sword holders across server and clients, and drops on Q press or discon

apps.name: PvP_Core_with_spawns
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: PvP combat core that watches player health events and triggers a death emote animation with freeze, then teleports the player to a random spawn point. Heals all players over time on the server and renders floating damage numbers as billboard UI text on the client, with crit styling in red.

apps.name: PVPblasterLATEST
apps.author: .hyp shaman
apps.description: PVP blaster weapon that players equip with E and drop with Q. Fires raycasted projectiles dealing configurable damage with headshot multipliers, spawns lightning and muzzle flash particles, plays spatial impact and lightning audio, supports first-person camera mode, health regeneration, and networke

apps.name: QuestItemBasic
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Collectible quest item that animates a 3D model with configurable rotation and bobbing, triggers a rigidbody collider to detect player overlap, plays a collection sound on pickup, hides the mesh, and emits a custom event signal for use with a companion QuestItemUI app.

apps.name: QuestItemUI
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Renders a configurable screen-space UI panel that tracks collected quest items. Listens for emit signals from collectible item apps, increments a counter, and syncs the count via persistent server storage across sessions. Supports customizable position, border style, text sizing, and display modes.

apps.name: Rain
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a downward-facing particle emitter from a 20x20 rectangle shape at height 10, rendering additive-blended rain drops with configurable texture image and alpha-over-life fade curves. Serves as a particle system reference demo.

apps.name: RainV3
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 billboard raindrop particles that fall with configurable gravity and speed, then triggers ring-shaped splash effects on ground contact. Uses a pooled particle system with camera-facing rotation and adjustable spawn radius, scale, and spawn rate.

apps.name: RainV4
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns up to 5000 raindrop particles that fall with configurable gravity and speed, then triggers ring-shaped splash effects on ground impact. A UI panel controls spawn rate, rain area radius, particle size, and toggles a grabbable cube for repositioning the rain emitter.

apps.name: Raptor_random_loc
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns an NPC raptor avatar that randomly transitions between walk, run, idle, and talk emote states. Each instance picks a unique random initial state and drifts direction with range-limiting logic. Renders a billboarded UI label displaying the controller's live world position and rotation coordina

apps.name: Raycaster
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Performs a server-side raycast from a beam origin and direction, then spawns a scaled clone of a 3D model at the hit point. Uses networked events to relay hit data from server to client and removes the previous clone before placing a new one.

apps.name: Ricky-3-2-show_chart
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Renders a remote chart image on a billboard UI panel fetched from a configurable URL. Triggers a cache-busting refresh when the player presses the action button within a configurable radius, with a cooldown timer to prevent spam.

apps.name: Rocket_Launcher_V3
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Interactive rocket launcher that triggers a launch sequence when the player holds an action button. Spawns additive exhaust particles on the rocket mesh, animates it skyward with quadratic easing to 500 units, then respawns it by rising smoothly from underground.

apps.name: RocketGlobalColl
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Interactive rocket launcher that triggers a globally synced launch sequence with additive exhaust particles. Players activate an action node to launch the rocket mesh skyward with quadratic easing, then it respawns by rising smoothly from underground after a timed delay.

apps.name: rom2
apps.author: general hyper
apps.description: Renders a configurable ROM cartridge 3D model with a UI text label displaying the rom name and adjusts material texture offsets to switch between seven color variants (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet) via a dropdown prop.

apps.name: Rover-LavaCargo
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Autonomous rover ship that patrols within a configurable radius, scans for nearby items via a perception system, and renders billboard UI panels displaying ship stability and cargo profitability stat bars that deplete over time. Emits ping and resource-transfer events to simulate a space trading sim

apps.name: Rover-RingedPlanet
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Autonomous collectron ship that patrols a bounded area around a ringed planet, scans for nearby items via a perception system, and renders billboard UI stat bars tracking Ship Stability and Cargo Profitability as they deplete over time. Emits ping and resource-transfer events to coordinate with othe

apps.name: Rover.2.11
apps.author: maximus
apps.description: Autonomous collectron rover that patrols within a configurable radius, detects nearby items via perception scans, and depletes health/loot stats over time. Renders a billboard UI panel displaying status, target info, and stat bars. Emits proximity-check and resource-transfer events to coordinate wit

apps.name: saori-2-5-trump-agent
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: AI-driven NPC agent using a VRM avatar that listens for chat messages and player enter/leave events, sends world state to an external endpoint, and renders speech bubble UI responses. Triggers configurable emotes (wave, think, cheer, explain) and rotates to look at targeted players.

apps.name: Screen
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Renders a TV screen that triggers screensharing via a player action button. Creates a 16:9 video node linked to the display geometry and supports an admin-restricted toggle to control who can share their screen within a 5-unit interaction distance.

apps.name: Screen_UI_link_section
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a toggleable screen-space UI panel with up to 14 configurable download link buttons. A toggle icon triggers the panel open/closed, and clicking a button opens the configured URL via world.open. Button count, labels, and URLs are all editable through app.configure.

apps.name: Seatv2
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Interactive seat that anchors a player to a configurable sitting position and triggers one of four selectable sitting emotes. Syncs occupancy state via server networking, displays a hover UI image on pointer enter, and supports both hold-action and click-pointer interaction modes with adjustable dis

apps.name: SimonSays_Screen
apps.author: cru
apps.description: Simon Says minigame screen that renders a UI panel displaying randomized color names across escalating phases. Server syncs game state to clients, triggers countdown timers, and emits color/reset signals to linked arena blocks via networked channels.

apps.name: SimonSays_Screen_2
apps.author: cru
apps.description: Renders a scalable 3D UI screen that displays a networked Simon Says color-matching game. Syncs game state between server and clients, cycles through timed phases showing flashing color text and background changes, and emits color/reset signals to connected game boards via app.emit.

apps.name: SimonSaysBoard
apps.author: cru
apps.description: Simon Says minigame board that displays a target color and toggles visibility of six colored cubes (RED, ORANGE, YELLOW, GREEN, BLUE, PURPLE) via color-update and reset events. Players must jump to the matching block in time. Work-in-progress prototype for a last-player-standing arena game.

apps.name: sit
apps.author: Wilson
apps.description: Renders a seat 3D model with an action button that lets a player sit down by anchoring them and playing a sitting emote animation. Syncs seat occupancy between server and clients so only one player sits at a time, and supports toggling trigger visibility.

apps.name: Smoke
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a cone-shaped smoke particle emitter that renders semi-transparent particles drifting upward with orbital velocity and rotation over lifetime. Supports a configurable texture image prop for the particle sprite. Serves as a reference demo for the Hyperfy particles API.

apps.name: SmolWrld
apps.author: .hyp shaman
apps.description: Miniature nature scene that plays six spatial audio sources (water and ambient music) attached to lake and waterfall reference nodes, rotates the sky dome, and scrolls water material texture each frame. Configurable volume, distance model, rolloff, and cone settings via UI panels.

apps.name: Solar_Panel
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: A solar panel 3D model that controls the world sky node by configuring sun direction, intensity, HDR lighting, and sky texture. Calculates sun position by rotating a direction vector based on configurable hour and AM/PM period settings.

apps.name: Solar_Panel_-_sundown
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Solar panel 3D model that configures the world sky node by setting a custom skybox texture, HDR environment map, sun direction based on hour/AM-PM input, and sun intensity. Calculates sun direction by rotating a vector around the X axis to simulate time-of-day lighting.

apps.name: spawn
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Configurable spawn point that listens for a server-side spawn event keyed by a numeric ID and teleports the requesting player to the app's position. Uses world.on and player.teleport for cross-app spawn coordination.

apps.name: SpeedTrail_v0.1
apps.author: Valiant
apps.description: Spawns dust-like trail particles behind the local player when moving on the ground, and triggers a radial particle burst on landing. Uses raycasts to detect ground distance and fall velocity, with configurable speed thresholds, spread, zigzag motion, and lifetime. Client-only; not synced to other pl

apps.name: SPICEXPortal
apps.author: .hyp shaman
apps.description: Configurable portal gate that spawns chaotic particles around a spinning rim, plays spatial audio, renders a billboard UI with destination name and subtitle, and opens a target world URL via trigger collider when a player enters the box zone.

apps.name: SplinePineV1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Spawns 30 cloned pine-part meshes along a sine-curve spline, scaling each piece smaller toward the top to procedurally generate a curved pine tree from a single lightweight 50kb GLB model. Randomizes global scale and Y-rotation on each load for natural variation.

apps.name: SS3
apps.author: ~/drdoge.eth
apps.description: Spawns a configurable particle aura effect around a 3D model with multiple color themes (nuka, plasma, quantum, fire, ghost, toxic) and effect styles (flame, energy, mist, sparkle, storm). Renders primary, secondary, and glow particle layers with customizable emission rates, lifetime, scale, cone an

apps.name: Super_Run
apps.author: Dhin
apps.description: Detects sustained sprinting via keyboard input and ground raycast, then pushes the player forward at boosted speed (30 units/s) and triggers a custom super-run emote animation. Deactivates with a short cooldown when the player stops running.

apps.name: szjanko-2-11-dice
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Interactive dice app that animates a 3D dice model when clicked. Triggers a rolling animation on pointer down, rotating the cube with easing over a two-second duration using per-frame update deltas. The rotation decelerates smoothly to simulate a realistic dice roll.

apps.name: Teleport_Command_v2
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Teleports a player to a stored destination when they type a configurable slash command (e.g. /home). An admin clicks a button to set the destination position and rotation, which persists via world storage. The server syncs destination state to all clients via networked events.

apps.name: TeleportTriggerBox
apps.author: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
apps.description: Spawns a customizable trigger zone that teleports players to a configurable X,Y,Z destination on entry. Creates a rigidbody with a geometry collider set as a trigger, and uses onTriggerEnter to call player.teleport. The box mesh can be toggled visible or hidden and scaled along each axis via props.

apps.name: test_level
apps.author: Saori
apps.description: Renders a static 3D test level model (~3 MB GLB) as an environment scene. The script exports an empty main function, so no runtime logic executes beyond loading and displaying the level geometry.

apps.name: Text_link_option
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a configurable world-space UI text panel with customizable size, color, alignment, and background. Triggers world.open to navigate to an optional URL when the user clicks the panel via onPointerDown.

apps.name: The_Grid
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Scene app that renders a configurable sky node with HDR lighting, calculates sun direction from elevation and horizontal rotation angles, and applies fog near/far distances and color. Supports swappable sky textures and adjustable sun intensity via a configure panel.

apps.name: The_Meadow
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Scene app that renders a meadow environment with configurable sky texture, HDR reflections, and fog. Calculates sun direction from elevation and horizontal rotation parameters, and applies sun intensity, color, and fog near/far distances to a sky node.

apps.name: TOKEN_GATE
apps.author: peezy
apps.description: Token-gated door that checks a player's Solana SPL token balance and animates a sliding or swinging door open when the minimum threshold is met. Renders UI panels displaying required token amount and live wallet balance. Auto-closes after a configurable timer. Requires external Solana mod.

apps.name: Tornado
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a tornado-style particle system using a circular emitter with orbital, linear, and radial velocity to create a swirling upward vortex. Supports a configurable texture image prop and renders up to 10,000 particles with alpha-over-life fade curves.

apps.name: TriggerZone
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Creates a configurable box collider trigger zone that detects when players enter and sends a notification message to a Discord webhook. Renders a semi-transparent emissive prim cube as a visual indicator with adjustable color, opacity, and size. Supports excluding specific player names from triggeri

apps.name: uiImage_from_File-update1
apps.author: 0mka
apps.description: Renders a configurable UI panel that displays a user-uploaded image file (jpg/png/webp) with adjustable width, height, object-fit mode, and 3D position. Creates uiview and uiimage nodes, supports billboard mode, and exposes range/number props for sizing and placement.

apps.name: Vanguard
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Class-based PvPvE combat character that equips a VRM avatar and sword weapon, triggers attack/charge/special emotes with audio, damages nearby players via overlapSphere hit detection, and renders an energy-based action bar UI with configurable crit damage.

apps.name: Video_Channel_Changer
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Plays a video atlas on a target mesh and cycles through 16 UV-based channels on pointer click. Supports mp4 files or HLS streams with configurable aspect ratio, fit mode, and looping. Replaces the original mesh geometry with a video node at the same transform.

apps.name: Video_with_player_UI
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a video surface with world-space Play, Pause, and Reset UI buttons that players can click to control playback. Syncs video state across multiplayer via client-server messaging, supports looping, configurable dimensions, volume, and fit modes.

apps.name: VideoEnhanced
apps.author: 3rdEyeVisuals
apps.description: Renders a video screen with configurable shape options (including oval) and a toggleable lit/unlit mode. Displays media on selectable geometric surfaces, allowing users to switch between shapes and lighting states via UI controls.

apps.name: VideoPlayer
apps.author: Valiant
apps.description: Plays video files or HLS (.m3u8) streams on a configurable surface node with adjustable width, height, fit, and volume. Syncs playback state across multiplayer clients using elapsed-time math for VOD and immediate play for live streams.

apps.name: Wall_Hang
apps.author: Dhin
apps.description: Wall hang mechanic that raycasts to detect ledges while the player falls, teleports the player to the grab point, and applies a hanging emote effect. Space triggers a climb impulse upward while S drops the player away from the wall normal.

apps.name: Water_Fountain
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Spawns a cone-shaped particle emitter that simulates a water fountain arc, emitting 100 blue-to-cyan particles per second with gravity force pulling them downward. Supports a configurable texture image and loops continuously in world space atop a 3D fountain model.

apps.name: Weightpaint_ScreenUI_test1
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a 10x10 screen-space UI grid that lets players paint squares by clicking and dragging. On mouse release, clones a flower/grass 3D model at corresponding world positions. The UI grid toggles visibility based on player distance (10m threshold) and supports right-click to reset all placed objec

apps.name: who_there
apps.author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
apps.description: Renders a screenspace UI panel in the top-right corner that displays an online player count and toggles an expandable list showing all player names. Listens for enter/leave events and syncs the roster every two seconds to keep the UI current.

apps.name: Wolf_Maro
apps.author: ash
apps.description: Renders a skinned wolf character mesh that plays an idle animation by default and triggers a random animation from the rig's animation list on pointer click, with configurable speed and crossfade blending.
